name: Katalon Recorder (Selenium tests generator)
summary: Selenium test recorder that bundles FingerprintJS Pro v3.9.3 for commercial-grade browser fingerprinting (canvas, WebGL, audio, fonts, 30+ signals). Stores persistent tracking IDs in triple-redundant storage (localStorage, sync storage, and cookie on fictitious katalon-persistent-domain.com with year 9999 expiry). Fingerprint ID sent with every analytics event to backend.katalon.com. Install event bypasses user tracking consent toggle.

vulnerabilities.title: FingerprintJS Pro Browser Fingerprinting
vulnerabilities.description: Bundles FingerprintJS Pro v3.9.3 that generates persistent visitorId using canvas, WebGL, audio, font fingerprinting and 30+ other signals. Sent as browser_id_2 with every Segment tracking event.

vulnerabilities.title: Persistent Cross-Domain Tracking Supercookie
vulnerabilities.description: Stores tracking IDs in localStorage, storage.sync (follows across devices), AND cookie on fictitious katalon-persistent-domain.com with year 9999 expiry. Triple-persistence survives any single storage clear.

vulnerabilities.title: Overly Permissive externally_connectable
vulnerabilities.description: Declares externally_connectable.ids: ['*'] allowing ANY Chrome extension to send messages and register capabilities.

flags.description: FingerprintJS Pro generates cross-session browser fingerprint sent to Katalon analytics backend; triple-persistence supercookie ensures tracking survives data clears
Creates persistent tracking cookie on fictitious katalon-persistent-domain.com with year 9999 expiry for supercookie tracking
